entries.journal_entry_description: Sera Jossi wants you to collect the liver of the mad Wookiee Wrhisch and take it to Dr. Cheyerooto in the medical center of Kachirho.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You will need to kill Wrhisch and collect his liver for further study.  When finished take it to Dr. Cheyerooto for study.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: In the abandoned village to the north the craze stricken wookiee gather. One of the first is a Wookiee named Wrhisch. You must bring his liver to Dr. Cheyerooto of Kachirho in the hopes of finding a cure.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Now that you have killed Wrhisch, take his liver to Dr. Cheyerooto in the Medical Center.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: In an old abandoned wookiee village the mad wookiee's gather.  Find among them Wrhisch and collect his liver for Dr. Cheyerooto
